refineIntoFour(PgElementSet, int) - Static method in class jvx.geom.PwRefineElementSet
This method assures, that the elementSet is suitable to be refined global into four; The positions of new vertices are computed upon the old connectivity, afterwards the new connectivity is generated by PgElementSet.refineGlobalIntoFour.

Refine the workshop's PgElementSet by Sqrt(2) Subdivision.
refineQuadSqrt2(PgElementSet) - Static method in class jvx.geom.PwRefineElementSet
Refine a PgElementSet by Sqrt(2) (or 4-8) Subdivision (by Luiz Velho and Denis Zorin) - this is a modified quad version, removing the old edges in every refinement step, so the mesh is a quadrangulation almost everywhere (at the boundary there may be triangles).
refineQuadSqrt2(PgElementSet, int) - Static method in class jvx.geom.PwRefineElementSet
Refine a PgElementSet by Sqrt(2) (or 4-8) Subdivision (by Luiz Velho and Denis Zorin) - this is a modified quad version, removing the old edges in every refinement step, so the mesh is a quadrangulation almost everywhere (at the boundary there may be triangles).
